sqlMap.select: select INVOICE_ID, ORDER_ID, INVOICE_TITLE, INVOICE_AMOUNT, INVOICE_TYPE, INVOICE_PROJ, CUSTOMER_EXPECTED_DATE, INVOICE_DATE, INVOICE_CODE, SENDOUT_WAY, INVOICE_CUSTOMER_ADDRESS, USER_ID, COMMENT1, INVOICE_STATE, CREATE_USER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_USER, MODIFY_TIME, DATA_STATE, BILLING_SUBJECT,BILLING_DATE,INVOICE_NUMBER from TB_ORDER_INVOICE_INFO where INVOICE_ID = #invoiceId:VARCHAR#

order by $orderByClause$
